definition: to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: Simultaneously, the SP aluminum thick film layer is the rear electrode.
sentences.chinese: 同時，鋁漿厚膜燒結層又作爲背面電極。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the industrial-scale experiment of carbon ferrochrome manufacture with sintered chromite.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了使用燒結鉻礦冶煉炭素鉻鐵的工業性試驗情況。

sentences.english: A kind of plastic theory of sinter is presented in this article.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一種燒結體塑性理論。

sentences.english: The room and high temperature mechanical strength of the hot-pressed B4C ceramic are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了熱壓燒結B4C陶瓷的室溫和高溫力學強度。

sentences.english: The strengthening mechanism of rare earth element in sintered copper molybdenum steel has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 探討了稀土在燒結銅鉬鋼中的作用機理。

sentences.english: Technology of obtaining Zinc-based sintered coating with globular Zinc powder was studied.
sentences.chinese: 探索了球狀鋅粉鋅基燒結塗層的基本工藝條件。

sentences.english: The sintering temperature and thermal expansion coefficient of the LSGM sample were determined using dilatometer.
sentences.chinese: 用熱膨脹儀確定了LSGM的燒結溫度及熱膨脹係數。

sentences.english: China has still a large number of residential construction using sintered clay brick.
sentences.chinese: 中國仍然有大量的住宅建築使用燒結粘土磚。

sentences.english: At the same time the theoritical difference between cast sintering and cast infiltrating was analysed.
sentences.chinese: 指出鑄造燒結與鑄滲原理是不同的。

sentences.english: The sintering test of hydrogoethites with proportioning of Australian iron ores was conducted.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了萍鋼公司燒結配加某澳大利亞礦粉的燒結試驗。

sentences.english: The sintering test of hydrogoethites with proportioning of Australian iron ores was conducted.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了萍鋼公司燒結配加某澳大利亞礦粉的燒結試驗。

sentences.english: A pin rack driven device for sinter circulate cooler was presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種燒結礦冷卻環冷機銷齒驅動裝置。

sentences.english: The result indicated there was better capability at 1550℃.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，在1550℃下燒結，各種性能較好。

sentences.english: The act mechanism of SYP sintering promoting agent was presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 簡要分析了SYP燒結增效劑的作用機理。

sentences.english: The author has summed up strengthening laws of sinter on the basis of experimental study.
sentences.chinese: 在實驗研究的基礎上，歸納出燒結體的強化規律。

sentences.english: The azotized silicon factory possesses the domestic advanced azotized silicon sintering equipments.
sentences.chinese: 氮化硅廠擁有國內先進的氮化硅燒結設備。
